remarks: A lower bound for an operator norm.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmolb.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmolb.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmolb.l $e |- L = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nmolb.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
nmolb.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmoolb $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T : X --> Y ) /\ ( A e. X /\ ( L ` A ) <_ 1 ) ) -> ( M ` ( T ` A ) ) <_ ( N ` T ) ) $.
